item.title: Error in procedure zDT_UPR00100U: Object name is invalid.
item.description:
Creating a test copy of a production database is standard practice for testing with current data. After restoring a production database copy to a test environment, it’s common to run a script to update database name references, ensuring everything points to the test database. However, while working with a GP 10 test database, I encountered an error related to creating or retrieving employee records, stating that the ‘UPR_MSTR’ table couldn’t be found...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/error-in-procedure-zdt-upr00100u-object-name-is-invalid/
